From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2024 film by Rudy Mancuso

Música is a 2024 American coming-of-age romantic comedy film starring and directed by Rudy Mancuso in his feature film directorial debut. Mancuso also co-wrote the screenplay with Dan Lagana and composed the film’s original soundtrack. Camila Mendes and J.B. Smoove co-star.
Música had its world premiere at South by Southwest on March 14, 2024, and was released by Amazon Prime Video on April 4, 2024.


Premise[edit]
This section does not cite any sources. Please help improve this section by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. (February 2024) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)
A young man, plagued by the music in his head, has to come to terms with an uncertain future while balancing love, family and Brazilian culture in Newark, New Jersey.[2]

Cast[edit]
Rudy Mancuso as Rudy
Camila Mendes as Isabella[4]
J.B. Smoove as Anwar
Francesca Reale as Haley
Maria Mancuso as Maria
Gabriela Amerth as Jill
Andy Grotelueschen as Professor
Camila Senna as Luana
Regina Schneider as Claire Dombeck
Additionally, Andy Muschietti appears as a Subway Busker.

Production[edit]
In April 2022, it was announced that a romantic comedy film written and directed by Rudy Mancuso titled Música was in development, with Mancuso, Camila Mendes, J.B. Smoove, Francesca Reale, and Maria Mancuso rounding out the cast.[5][6]

Release[edit]
Música had its world premiere at South by Southwest on March 13, 2024.[7] [8]It was released in the United States on April 4, 2024.[9]

Reception[edit]
On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, the film holds an approval rating of 97% based on 34 reviews, with an average rating of 7.6/10.[10]
